price: Harta dan anak-anak adalah perhiasan kehidupan dunia, tetapi amalan-amalan yang kekal lagi saleh adalah lebih baik pahalanya di sisi Tuhan-mu serta lebih baik untuk menjadi harapan.
arabic: ٱلۡمَالُ وَٱلۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ أَمَلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-mālu wal-banūna zīnatu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun amalan
